Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is a free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like Popstarmail, Netaddress, YouTube, Interia, LinkedIn, Mail.com, Walla, Clevergo, Mail.ru, Yandex, Azet, IndiaTimes, Bigstring, Yahoo!, Apropo, Mail2World, Inet, AOL, Mail.in, FastMail, GMail, Live/Hotmail, Grafitti, Rambler, Freemail, Evite, Terra, Zapakmail, KataMail, Canoe, India, GMX.net, Sapo.pt, Abv, Atlas, 5Fm, OperaMail, Uk2, Techemail, Inbox.com, MSN, Gawab, Lycos, Mynet.com, Care2, Web.de, Xing, Virgilio, Meta, Kids, Aussiemail, Pochta, O2, Wp.pt, Nz11, Bordermail, Hushmail, Doramail, Rediff, Libero, Plaxo or social portals like Mydogspace, Last.fm, Badoo, Twitter, Hyves, Bebo, Facebook, Orkut, Brazencareerist, Tagged, Xuqa, Mycatspace, NetLog, Ning, Lovento, Eons, Perfspot, Mevio, Flixster, Livejournal, Skyrock, Friendfeed, Faces, Flingr, Vimeo, Meinvz, Flickr, Friendster, Multiply, MySpace, Kincafe, Plazes, Famiva, Fdcareer, Cyworld, Konnects, Bookcrossing, Xanga, Vkontakte, Koolro, Motortopia, Plurk, Hi5. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like PHPMELODY, Vwebmail, Joomla1.0, JamRoom, Buddy Zone, vBulletin, Etano, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), symfony, Social Engine 4, Social Engine, Atmail5, Dating Pro, PunBB, jamit job, Wordpress, Boonex Dolphin, joovili, nowFire, Drupal, phpFoX, E107, Joomla, phpizabi, RoundCube, PhpBB, myBB. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
